entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
